ability.mineminenomi.mouton_shot.descrip: High speed forward dash, followed by rapid kick
ability.mineminenomi.stealth_black_invis: Turns the user's entire body invisible
ability.mineminenomi.sanzen_sekai.descri:
The user dashes forward rapidly spinning swords in hands to gain more momentum and slash opponent as strong as possible

§2SHIFT-USE while haki imbuing is active§r: Sends Extreme powerful shockwave strong enough to cut giant mountains
ability.mineminenomi.ashura_ichibugin.de: User uses immense power to split own body to 3 afterimages, then strikes opponent turning any projectiles on the way to mist
ability.mineminenomi.cape_guard.descript: User covers himself with his cape to protect himself from damage
ability.mineminenomi.sparking_figure.des:
Powerful punch that creates explosion

§2Shift+use§r: changes mode to Double
ability.mineminenomi.ryosei_osoba_kick.d: User uses jet boots to fly up, then propels himself forward towards enemy
ability.mineminenomi.poison_hit.descript: Infuses all attacks with strong poison
ability.item.message.need_three_sword: You need three swords to use this ability!
quest.objective.mineminenomi.kill_%s_ene: Kill %s enemies with critical attacks using sword
Kill %s enemies  using Sanbyakurokuju Pound Ho
